DOC.brief_summary: This is a 12-week study that will test the safety and efficacy of asenapine when used in addition to lithium or valproate for subjects with acute manic or mixed episodes of Bipolar I Disorder.
DOC.brief_title: 12 Week Study of the Safety/Efficacy of Asenapine When Added to Lithium/Valproate in the Treatment of Bipolar Disorder (A7501008)(COMPLETED)(P05844)
DOC.criteria: Have bipolar I disorder, current episode manic or mixed Treated with lithium or valproic acid Have an unstable medical condition Clinically significant laboratory abnormality. Have a primary diagnosis other than bipolar I disorder.
